scripts.build:css: tailwindcss -i src/assets/css/tailwind.css -o src/assets/css/style.css && copy node_modules\preline\dist\preline.js src\assets\js\ &&  copy node_modules\flowbite\dist\flowbite.js src\assets\js\ && copy node_modules\toastify-js\src\toastify.js src\assets\js\ && copy node_modules\clipboard\dist\clipboard.js src\assets\js\
